name.description: The name of the failover group. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group containing the SQL server

server_name.description: The name of the primary SQL server. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
server_name.notes: The failover group will create a secondary database for each database listed in `databases`. If the secondary databases need to be managed through Terraform, they should be defined as resources and a dependency added to the failover group to ensure the secondary databases are created first.

partner_servers.description: A list of secondary servers as documented below

read_write_endpoint_failover_policy.description: A read/write policy as documented below

readonly_endpoint_failover_policy.description: a read-only policy as documented below

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

mode.description: the failover mode. Possible values are `Manual`, `Automatic`
